alert.note: Alert for Cooke (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 7:16PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Cooke County through 800 PM CDT... At 715 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hubert H Moss Lake, or near Gainesville, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Muenster, Lindsay, Callisburg, Lake Muenster, Hubert H Moss Lake, Lake Kiowa, Valley View, Walnut Bend, Bulcher, Sturgeon, Marysville, Sivells Bend, Woodbine, Dexter, Burns, Myra, Illinois Bend, and Lake Ray Roberts. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 489 and 503. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
